item.slimesurvival.experience_crystal.de:
§7This crystal is able to hold a large supply of experience.

§e• Insert experience by right clicking.
§e• Extract experience by shift right clicking.
§e• Transfer rate is 10 while in mainhand, 100 while in offhand.
item.slimesurvival.polar_bear_fur.toolti: §7• Can be found in medium quantities on polar bears
§7• Essential material for winter clothing and medical dressings
item.slimesurvival.axolotl_gills.tooltip: §7• Rare drop from axolotls and "fish" fishing
§7• Potent regenerative abilities that can be used in armor and medicine
item.slimesurvival.mystite_ingot.details:
§7Highly durable and strong, this metal won't
§7falter unless submerged in water.
item.slimesurvival.mystite_tool_rod.deta: §7A reinforced stick used for the crafting of stronger tools and weapons.
item.slimesurvival.mystite_ore.details:
§7Contains slight traces of redstone
§7and an unknown metal.

§7Resistant to high temperatures; can
§7only be smelted in a blast furnace.
item.slimesurvival.mystite_ore.how_to_ob:
§7Rarely found in deepslate redstone ore
§7when using a §lMystite Pickaxe§r§7.
item.slimesurvival.enderium_alloy.detail:
§7Exerts magical properties far beyond
§7those of ordinary metallic substances

§7May also have some applications as an ingredient
§7for mage armor, tools, and weapons.
item.slimesurvival.rift_battleaxe.detail:
§7A heavy weapon that swings slow but hits §lreally§r§7 hard.

§7Right clicking will push away nearby mobs and players at the
§7cost of a short movement speed penalty afterwards.
item.slimesurvival.ban_hammer.details:
§7It unleashes an ungodly amount of energy at whomever it hits.
§7It does §lnot§r§7 ban players.
item.slimesurvival.winter_coat.details:
§7Made from polar bear fur, fox hide, and woven thread.
§7It also provides a moderate amount of insulation
item.slimesurvival.utility_belt.details:
§7Made from leather and gold, the utility
§7belt allows for an extra trinket on your belt.
item.slimesurvival.bloodstained_glass.de:
§7§oMedium risk, medium reward

§cImplements partial life steal, recovering 25% of damage dealt as
§chealth regenerated to its user.
item.slimesurvival.reactor_core.details:
§7Emits short doses of radiation that augment cell count rapidly.

§7The short doses of radiation may cause fatigue and, in rare cases, cancer.
§§
